Package prover.gui.editor

Provides all the facilities to highlight a prover language file.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IColorConstants An interface to define some basic colors and tags to use with the rules and/or scanners.
 

Class Summary
BasicPresentationReconciler A presentation reconciler to avoid editing of a text below a limit defined by a scanner associated with it.
BasicRuleScanner A minimal implementation of a RuleBasedScanner.
BasicSourceViewerConfig A viewer to use with a prover editor.
BasicTextAttribute A text attribute class with enhanced background color support.
BasicTextPresentation This class is just the same as the normal text presentation class, but some useful methods are added.
FixedSizeWordRule A rule to detect words of a fixed size.
LimitRuleScanner A specific scanner that highlight text using the specified rules.
ProverEditor The editor used to edit any prover language defined file.
 

Package prover.gui.editor Description

Provides all the facilities to highlight a prover language file. The main class in this package is the ProverEditor class, but there are also lots of helper classes buried under, which could be useful in another context, or help define the scanners used to do the highlightings.

See Also:
TextEditor
